system.description:
Effect: All valid targets lose -1 ATK, SPAK, and ACC stages for 7 Activations.

The user may spend up to 12 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 20 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Eternamax Eternatus and has a Eternabeam on their Active List.

actions.name: E-Max Blastwave
